Uses of Class
com.sap.mobile.services.client.push.WnsNotification.Builder

  • Packages that use WnsNotification.Builder 
    Package Description
    com.sap.mobile.services.client.push  

    • Uses of WnsNotification.Builder in com.sap.mobile.services.client.push

      Methods in com.sap.mobile.services.client.push that return WnsNotification.Builder 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      WnsNotification.Builder WnsNotification.Builder.audio​(WnsNotificationAudio audio)
      Specifies a sound to play when a notification is displayed.
      WnsNotification.Builder WnsNotification.Builder.badge​(String badge)
      Badge is used to provide status or summary info in the form of a system-provided glyph or a number from 1-99.
      WnsNotification.Builder WnsNotification.Builder.baseUri​(String baseUri)
      A default base URI that is combined with relative URIs in image source attributes.
      static WnsNotification.Builder WnsNotification.builder()  
      WnsNotification.Builder WnsNotification.Builder.commands​(WnsNotificationCommands commands)
      Specifies that the notification is being used to indicate an incoming call or an alarm, with appropriate commands associated with each scenario.
      WnsNotification.Builder WnsNotification.Builder.image​(List<WnsNotificationImage> image)
      Specifies an image used in the template.
      WnsNotification.Builder WnsNotification.Builder.lang​(String lang)
      The target locale of the XML payload
      WnsNotification.Builder WnsNotification.Builder.message​(List<String> message)
      The message element defines the text attribute for tile and toast notifications.
      WnsNotification.Builder WnsNotification.Builder.rawData​(String rawData)
      The rawData element represents a certain WNS push schema (wns/raw).
      WnsNotification.Builder WnsNotification.Builder.schema​(List<String> schema)
      The schema indicates the type of notification and how WNS should handle it.
      WnsNotification.Builder WnsNotification.Builder.tileTemplate​(String tileTemplate)
      Specifies the content template to use in a tile update.
      WnsNotification.Builder WnsNotification.Builder.toastTemplate​(String toastTemplate)
      Specifies the template to use in a toast notification.
      WnsNotification.Builder WnsNotification.Builder.version​(String version)
      The version element sets the version property at the notification requests
